DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of amlodipine/atorvastatin therapy by assessing the percentage of subjects who reach target blood pressure (BP) and LDL-C targets as defined by their governing guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study To Assess The Effectiveness Of Amlodipine-Atorvastatin Combination In Hypertension And Dyslipidemia.
DOC.criteria: Treated or untreated subjects with concurrent hypertension and dyslipidemia with BP and LDLC not at target according to governing guidelines High liver enzymes
